title: I cannot log into my main account
body:
My main account is in the N.A region. When I look it up, it is still there. However, when I go to log in, I am told that I am I attempting to log into an account from a different region and I must choose the appropriate region. Now this is where it gets better.  tried doing as told, and I seem to be on none of the other regions. 
I don't know what to do. My Summoner name is American Liqueur, and you can see me on the N.A server. 
I am in  a state of panic because I can also no longer log into my account on this website. 
Please help me in any way. I have tried all the possible things me and a friend can think of.
And yes, I have sent a ticket to the riot support. But that will take a long time to receive a response to.
Thank you for you time

replies.body:
Since you've already submitted a ticket, I recommend sitting tight while a member of our accounts team gets back to you. This will take some investigation and info checking before we can resolve this, so please be patient.

Let me know if you have any questions.

The only thing is is that i can no longer gain access to my account to look at the ticket. will i just revive an E-mail?
Also thank you for the reply, i understand you are busy
If you submitted the account recovery form that asks for a contact email, then yes!
